articles.description: Under its current licence, police are not given figures about drugs seized on site, a council hears.
articles.content:
Glastonbury Festival might have to change its drug testing policy as part of a review of its licence.
The licence for the event, at Worthy Farm in Somerset, includes a management plan aimed at keepi… [+1992 chars]
